website_summaries.verdict: The PlayStation Platinum Wireless Headset from Sony offers a comfortable fit and strong audio performance for PS4 gaming.

customer_reviews.title: Earcups can give you sore ears
customer_reviews.text: These earcups are the most uncomfortable I’ve ever worn. Really needs some redesigning, it’s not the common issue of your ears heating up, its the fact that they’ve been designed in a way that the speakers slant towards to the frontal side of your ear and crushes it onto your head. This can get really uncomfortable after a couple hours.
customer_reviews.author: Laptop

customer_reviews.title: Buy the previous model !
customer_reviews.text: Just okay. Haven't noticed any difference to the previous model apart from this one is alot less comfortable. Buy the gold ones !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the previous gold model
customer_reviews.text: Had the old gold ones which in my opinion gave better quality than most 200 cans. Though this would be an upgrade but they don’t sound as good and whilst ok they are nothing amazing and feel very tight after a bit as high pressure . I would but the older gold 7.1 as more comfortable for longer gaming sessions and although not amazing build the sound is crazy for price point
customer_reviews.author: AGENT6660

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on release and got to say there well worth it. Had a lots of problems finding a headset that's comfy and doesn't make my ears ache after a while but because the foam on the headset sits around the ear rather than on it these are extremely comfy. The 3d sound is awesome, especially with shooter games. The battery life is also impressive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Headset which links perfectly with the PS4
customer_reviews.text: Best headest I've owned for my PS4 witout any issues. Roughly 7hrs battery life of constant use. It does has 3d Audio but there's almost nothing out there which can support this at the moment. Because it's an official product of Sony, it links perfectly with the PS4. You can customise the headset settings through the PS4 via an app. (Battery life and mic on/off is displayed on screen for a few seconds when pressed or turn on. My previous headset was the Turtle Beach PX4 which had cutting out issues. Hence why the change.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality on this product is superb, you can really tell which direction sounds are coming from and if you use the headset companion app you can customise the settings and some games have their own settings designed spec for that game. They are lightweight and comfortable to wear, although after several hours the rubber band over the top digs in a bit. Gave it four stars because although it's excellent for gaming, if I connect it to my phone or mp3 player the volume is too low.
customer_reviews.author: ChrissyNix

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, broken after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: The headphones sound quality it's good, they fit perfectly with the VR and grant a full immersion experience. However, after 6 months the right speaker stopped working consistently. There are days in which it work others, in which the volume is unpaired with the left speaker, and more frequently it just doesn't work. I've tried to connect them to the console both wireless and wired, and nothing change. I've tried to check if it was a sort of pan setting, but it's not possible to set the pan on the app. So I assume it;s a hardware issue. It's unacceptable that a Sony product that cost 130£ is so unreliable!
customer_reviews.author: TheJayS

customer_reviews.title: Would give 0 stars if possible.
customer_reviews.text: Simply put - it does not work. Mine was delivered and the sound out of the left ear was much quieter than the right ear. If you look up this problem, you'll find others with the same issue and Sony has not bothered to address it and I dare to say is not accepting that there is a serious flaw with this product. For the price you are expected to pay, having it broken out of the box with a manufacturing defect is unacceptable. You wouldn't accept it for a £10 headset so definitely don't accept it here. I own the PS4 Gold headset which is much better than this rubbish. Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Y

customer_reviews.title: Sound gone in left ear, Sony/Playstation won't help (i.e. warranty is useless)
customer_reviews.text: Lovely headphones but with a massive flaw, the sound goes in the left ear cup. I'm past my return window with Amazon so called Sony/Playstation who told me there's nothing they can do and they don't support the device, despite it being in warranty. When it worked, it was brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Falmouth88

customer_reviews.title: Good, I have two of these
customer_reviews.text: Good, I have two of these. Get a little uncomfortable after about two hours if not seated correctly. I have a very large head but they still work sell. Just need to put them on right. Great sound. Very good with PSVR.
customer_reviews.author: LBJ

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: These are the best gaming headphones I’ve ever used, the accuracy on call of duty blackout is unbelievable, great battery life, comfy, loud, very very good set up, recommended
customer_reviews.author: Danimal

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is as expected from Sony, amazing. The build quality however is absolute rubbish. Cheap plastic not built to last. The hinges WILL break even with the utmost level of care during use. Avoid this product and do not buy from 3rd party sellers on Amazon as you will have a nightmare getting a replacement when it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Inspector Gadget

customer_reviews.title: Top quality headset!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my partner for Christmas. We have used other brands such as turtle beach and hyper x cloud prior to this on the ps4, however this is by far the best headset we have used. Great sound quality, comfortable, no wires, awesome mic and looks great too. Would definitely recommend to any ps4 player who uses a headset regularly!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Miles

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headset
customer_reviews.text: It’s great overall product. Quality of the product is good for the price you’re paying. Love the audio quality. It is incredible, crystal clear and loud. Best thing about the headset, I think is that you can have your own custom made audio output and you can adjust the volume between the game and party conversation. Overall, I think it is an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Ostapenko

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding, the 3D sound mode is amazing in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding, the 3D sound mode is amazing in the few games that support it. Unfortunately one ear stopped working after only a few months but amazon processed a return for me and the replacement now is working great. They do get abit sore on the head if wearing for a few hours but other than that would totally recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Unusably uncomfortable and ridiculously expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Having previously owned the official sony 2.0 headset and loving it I thought these would be a good upgrade. Sadly, these have one glaring problem: they are VERY uncomfortable. My old ones had a really nice padding on the top. Whoever decided to ditch that for the horrble thin rubber strap needs to be fired. Your head will not be able to wear these for more than 2 hours. For the price the sound quality does not sound any better than the old ones. Tldr: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality ,comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Ps4 gaming,sound quality is amazing ,changes the game ,great sound ,hearing things on the game which weren't there with old set ,so a massive advantage ,unlike some reviews I read ,these are very comfortable indeed Fast delivery ,well packed ,pricey but worth every penny ,deluxe presentation box ,quality item really pleased ,would highly recommend ,a must for gamers ,opens up a new experience sound wise ,which is so important to online play
customer_reviews.author: TALI

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Sound quality is awesome. My usual brand is Bose and these aren't far off. Comfy, practical, seamless, and no mic dangling in front of your mouth. No need to look any further!
customer_reviews.author: terry beckett

customer_reviews.title: The look and feel like a premium product
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. I've worn them and don't find them tight unlike other reviewers. The sound and build quality is as you would expect from a Sony product. The look and feel like a premium product.
customer_reviews.author: Snips

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easy, Bluetooth dongle can't be replaced
customer_reviews.text: Had for a year, light use. The dongle is replaceable, so if you lose it you're buggered. Luckily found mine, but not long after, the right hinge broke whilst putting the things on. Tiny plastic hinge. Almost designed to be broken haha. Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.author: vera

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for VR and Immersion
customer_reviews.text: A lot of additional accessories provides wired and wireless support, 3D audio and individual game audio setups can be used for that particular game or VR, nothing wrong with the product as this is the best one for your PS4
customer_reviews.author: Qais Sarfraz

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother wasting your money on these.
customer_reviews.text: I brought these because my old Sony PlayStation headset broke at one of the hinges. Tried to repair them but kept falling apart. These where supposed to be an ideal replacement but I was WRONG. Theirs not enough foam in the ear cups and the rubber strap that goes over your head makes your head sweat and irritable. The discomfort around the ears due to the lack of extra foam becomes unbearable after only an hour of usage. Sony go back to the drawing board and come up with something better, PLEASE.
customer_reviews.author: A PS4 gamer, Mapman556.

customer_reviews.title: So far - Damb these are better than my old astro a50
customer_reviews.text: So far - Damb these are better than my old astro a50.... nuff said .... buy buy buy ... the sound is sublime, to the point i was made to stop playing re7 .... my gramma aside really just buy.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dowling

customer_reviews.title: Buy the PS4 2.0 for half the price and better Sound
customer_reviews.text: It's a good Stereo-Headset and a worse Surround-Sound-Headset. The 3D Sound for me is not good and far away from beeing a Surround-Sound... And it's way too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Dominik & Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality and ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones, I also have Cloud Revolver S and PlayStation pulse and the quality is similar. Handy on headphone buttons for volume, mic mute and profile select which you can adjust to your own sound preference and store in one of two slots. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HEADPHONES BUT....
customer_reviews.text: Great they don't hurt, high sound quality for everything, unfortunately i had to return them for a issue about audio, when turned on i receive audio only in the right cup.. so i have tryed to reset them but with no success for my issue. I have ordered another pair thanks to Amazon which have refund me at 100% and now i hope they will work as intended. I will Edit this review in case they have other problems.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.White

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you need for a gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality of sound from the game & when you speak to your friends and family, when playing on the PS4 would recommend these to everyone
customer_reviews.author: GAVIN LENNON

customer_reviews.title: USB dogle suddenly broken and no possible replacement
customer_reviews.text: After 1,5 years the USB wireless adapter just broke, If you google it is a known issue with no solution and no possible replacement for the dongle, very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome when paired with PS4
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for use with PS4, connects effortlessly, great sound, easy use buttons, comfortable fit, easy to add/change profiles. Great battery life. Cons: heavy so wouldn't use on small children, can get a bit sweaty if very hot.
customer_reviews.author: Jaam

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift. Stopped working wirelessly after 30 minutes. Asked amazon for a replacement but they said no. Will have to wait for post office to open to ship back and then wait in a refund. Have since found out it’s a common fault.
customer_reviews.author: Ama Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I expected incredible 3D audio in Horizon,uncharted or God of war but the audio is just average quality to me.nothing special. +There is no enough space inside the headphones,my ears touch the surface inside and after 2-3 hours of playing it becomes very uncomfortable.does not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like the feel of this and hurt after a while. Also think mine has a fault as was louder in one side than the other. Ended up returning.
customer_reviews.author: Mikeyp

customer_reviews.title: Very nice headset
customer_reviews.text: Great headset, if expensive. Great for gaming, and also for watching movies when the other half has gone to bed. Comfort-wise: Wore these four about 4-5 hours one session - only needed one rest to let my ears breath. Also makes for decent stereo headphones when plugged in to an Xbox One via the joypad.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bratchell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound and can be used wired or on Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great quality. You can use it via Bluetooth or wired (perfect or Pc gamers as well)
customer_reviews.author: LEO ALMEIDA

customer_reviews.title: Poor Mic , returned after a week.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality excellent. Not very comfy , a bit tight Mic quality poor. Friends said mic sounded muffled, tried fixing but in the end I returned it. Rattled in the left ear piece from one of the buttons Amazon were excellent , no hassle whatsoever in returning the product
customer_reviews.author: Gerard

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic if you like spending extra
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic if you like spending extra, if not, get the ps gold ones these are only a little better!! But they are better
customer_reviews.author: louis ward

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing for gaming, however this headset lacks bass and the in-built microphone has lacklucster quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nile B

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is amazing, so comfortable when playing for long periods of time, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: James Dey

customer_reviews.title: Great audio but mic broken after 13months
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for 13 months... Now Mic doesn't work properly and can't be used. Oh and warranty is 1yr....last time I buy a Sony product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for sound quality, sometimes my friends tell me I sound really quiet, by turning on and off it’s sorted, would be 5* but the comfort of the headset isn’t very good
customer_reviews.author: Travcart

customer_reviews.title: Ps4 perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great love these found them comfortable, can seem tight after using them for a good few hours, perfect for firestorm and games alike, and great for general music etc
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: The feedback is great sound quality and comfortable headphones
customer_reviews.text: Purchased PS4 Platinum Wireless headset as a Christmas gift for my son. The feedback is great sound quality and comfortable headphones. There has been plenty of gaming on the PS4 with the headphones, in particular Fornite, which has went down fantastically well. I highly recommend. Kind regards, Paul S
customer_reviews.author: Paul Sorrie

customer_reviews.title: An ok item
customer_reviews.text: On sound . 7 1 isn't that special. To use on none ps4 devices such as I pad it only links via a cable.... not blutooth. Battery life medioca
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: does what you want
customer_reviews.text: pretty surprising, i use them a lot, with no issues, great sound, great sound quality, very clear
customer_reviews.author: Simma

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, not quite worth the price, but if you can get them slightly cheaper then defo.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, not quite worth the price, but if you can get them slightly cheaper then defo. Came early too 😃 the box is well padded
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Not the best.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t think much of the sound quality. Average at best and not especially comfortable. There are better alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: PluckyBrit

customer_reviews.title: Enhance the game
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. These add so much depth to the gaming experience with the virtual 7.1 surround sound. The battery life is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Edbongo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Got exactly what I expected. Good quality and delivered promptly.
customer_reviews.author: alexa

customer_reviews.title: I could hardly believe my ears.
customer_reviews.text: Holy moly, I have an excellent surround sound system, and these are just as freaking good.
customer_reviews.author: chris hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Not for VR but 100% for PS4 anyways.
customer_reviews.text: These were advertised as “best suited for PSVR” by google, They do not in fact work with VR, but nonetheless. These are an amazing pair of headphones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They broke after 5-6 months
customer_reviews.text: these headphones were fine whilst they worked but one day i was playing a game when they just stopped working in one ear, no clue why. i treated them very well and never did anything bad to them, one minute they were working, the next: broken.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Tilzey

customer_reviews.title: Ok sound if your new to headphone audio.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this headset...the 3d sound effect was quite good but the overall sound quality wasnt impressive. Ive been using an old set of xbox x41 wireless headphones on my ps4 from launch and they have better sound quality than the platinum set. Return started.
customer_reviews.author: Garry seville

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I pre-ordered it in 2017. The sound quality is good, but it is not durable. After 2 years, I cannot charge it anymore. It is too heavy and tight.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Before this ones my boyfriend had some cheaper headphones, but they broke so quickly. Now after more than year using every day, they are still ok. Worth for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Santa

customer_reviews.title: Need breaking in!!
customer_reviews.text: Genuinely not as comfy as the original gold 2.0. Have loosened up after fair use and breaking in but initially caused pain after a few hours of use each time
customer_reviews.author: GenDits

customer_reviews.title: Useless if USB breaks!
customer_reviews.text: USB has stopped working after 4 months. Unable to get a replacement. This has rendered £130 headset unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Clargo

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth issues
customer_reviews.text: Had to send the product back after a few weeks as there are frequent problems with the Bluetooth connection. Considering the cost, having the headset disconnect in the middle of a game is simply unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy setup on the PS4, very comfortable, great sound and surprisingly good 3D surround effect.
customer_reviews.author: Gui

customer_reviews.title: Very good but tight fit makes hot work on warm days!
customer_reviews.text: Tight fit for a big head! Nice quality sound and direction perception.
customer_reviews.author: Jolly Giant

customer_reviews.title: They're okay
customer_reviews.text: I think you can probably get better for the price off brand though
customer_reviews.author: Stu Bee

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to your ps4 setup
customer_reviews.text: Good Build and sound quality and 3d virtual sound that helps in a online shooting games, occassionally it disconnects for a second or two but it's no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Lukas Rupeika

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Excellent sound quality. Does what it promises- love 3D Audio sound!
customer_reviews.author: Katarzyna

customer_reviews.title: BRoke after 12 months
customer_reviews.text: The bluetooth dongle stopped working after 12 months. Called Sony who offered no help or solutions and just said it was out of warranty. Avoid
customer_reviews.author: Mary N. Coll

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable headset
customer_reviews.text: These were bought as a replacement for an older version. My husband says they are very comfy with better sound.
customer_reviews.author: karen f.

customer_reviews.title: much better than the Gold version
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding, much better than the Gold version. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Patricio

customer_reviews.title: Better performance than the 2.0!!!
customer_reviews.text: VSS is banging, the larger drivers emphasise the gunshots and explosions.
customer_reviews.author: Chantal L

customer_reviews.title: Very, very good.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at a reasonable price. Can’t get them back off my son now. Very comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Poole

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: My step-son is very happy with this product, he says it is clear
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Francis

customer_reviews.title: Audio stopped working after 6-7 months
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 7 months and now it doesn’t work at all I can only hear party audio and game audio is just a constant static sound
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Flaky ear cushions, broken hinge.
customer_reviews.text: Had them less then 2 years, hinge broke and flaky ear cushions Playstation didn't won't to know but Amazon was fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: paul thorpe

customer_reviews.title: Reportedly microphone sometimes noisy and unclear...
customer_reviews.text: Clean lines, light weight, set up takes a little getting used to but once learned is simple. Good 3d sound effect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really satisfied
customer_reviews.text: If you want a headset for PS4 no other headset will fit like this one. This is optimized for the ps4 and for it's 3d sound, others are amazing but only for pc
customer_reviews.author: Nuria

customer_reviews.title: Not so cumfy after two hours of use.
customer_reviews.text: I expect more for 3D Audio sound effect. Overall in this prize range £100 -115 the headset would be money well spend
customer_reviews.author: J-P V

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones... I would recommend them to anyone one who is a gamer.
customer_reviews.author: Wicked

customer_reviews.title: Sony headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable to wear for any length of time and sound isn’t the best around for the money
customer_reviews.author: NAME_NOT_RETURNED

customer_reviews.title: Best headset for the ps4!
customer_reviews.text: Top headset for ps4! Works fine on pc too. Quality of sound and battery's life.
customer_reviews.author: Kresimir Kovacevic

customer_reviews.title: Great quality headset, works well
customer_reviews.text: These work extremely well, great for gaming or conference calls. Would be better if they supported Bluetooth too!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price + completely wireless unlike most
customer_reviews.text: Great for the value use most days for a couple hours no issues at all had for a couple months now
customer_reviews.author: laykum

customer_reviews.title: To expensive for what it is
customer_reviews.text: The older model is much More comfortable and more sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Frog

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup, superb sound quality and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.author: John Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, breakdown easily
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality and all was excellent, however headset isn't working in one ear. Not had item very long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, good battery life, look good and excellent delivery. What's not to like. Get on it.
customer_reviews.author: David Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend and he is very pleased with the sound quality compared to his previous version. He has said they are a bit tight but this hopefully will change over time. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: EmmaMichelle

customer_reviews.title: Faulty item - returned
customer_reviews.text: Had to return after 2 days as left ear speaker stopped working, awaiting a refund.
customer_reviews.author: alan

customer_reviews.title: Very Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality but very uncomfortable, especially after long gaming sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Trottalot26

customer_reviews.title: Chat volume far too low.
customer_reviews.text: Single player sounds great. Multiplayer chat is just nowhere near loud enough, you really struggle to hear people. I regret buying.
customer_reviews.author: Ricy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service great quality made a teenager very happy this christmas
customer_reviews.author: louise hills

customer_reviews.title: Average Average Average
customer_reviews.text: Average sound quality, much better out there for the same price
customer_reviews.author: Tom Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality on this head is excellent and shipping was very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Cregan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, however the box was opened before it came to my house.
customer_reviews.author: Márcio Costa

customer_reviews.title: Good headset for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Can't fault this. Half the price of something like an Astro A50 but sounds as good to my ears. In fact it has one of the best surround effects I've experienced in a headset.
customer_reviews.author: G D

customer_reviews.title: expected a quality product from Sony :(
customer_reviews.text: As soon I got them and out of the box they were a great headset with a very nice sound detail, managed to connect with no problems to the ps4. All of this lasted 5/10 minutes before the USB dongle starts flashing and the headset either gets disconnected either starts cutting the sound in and off every few seconds. Could only fix this by reinserting the USB dongle and enjoy 5 more minutes; even after downloading the companion app and upgrading to the latest firmware nothing changed and I've found several other people who had the same exact problem.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother unless you have a small head!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a small head I recommend getting these headphone as the sound and mic quality is excellent, however if your head is slightly larger than average, don't bother with these. I wore them for less than 1 hour and had to remove them due to the pressure of the headphones giving me terrible a headache. I have had to badly bend the me metal band to relieve SOME of the pressure. I'm already looking for something else. These headphones would have recieved 1 star if not for the quality of the sound and mic.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Good upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quality and really comfortable, I upgraded to these from the gold headset. You can tell the difference in the sound especially when playing uncharted 4,lets hope that all games now start having 3d audio built in
customer_reviews.author: jonathan barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, not so great for chatting
customer_reviews.text: These headphones do sound really great and are very easy to install. The 3D audio feature is incredible for being a pair wireless cans, so really no complaints there. However, the microphone tends to create some artifacts when the function to hear your own voice is set to the highest volume. That’s unfortunate, as it makes chatting less of a pleasurable experience. Build quality is ok, but the plastic feels rather hollow and fragile.
customer_reviews.author: NickZar

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I had the Sony Gold 2.0 headset and loved it but the well documented headband fault happened to mine unfortunately. These have for the bill as a perfect replacement, sound quality is ace (especially with the 3D/VSS on). The only bug bear / issues that have stopped me from giving it 5 stars would be the battery life and overall volume as the battery life doesn't seem to last more than a few hours and the overall volume could be louder. Apart from those though I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Please buy with extension cable for USB dongle otherwise it will cut out
customer_reviews.text: Headphones sound quality is excellent with 3D as well as 7.1 virtual surround sound. I have given 4 stars because there is a glitch with the product. It will cut out automatically as well as when you place your hand onto left headphone unless you place the USB dongle at least 2 feet away from the console. You will notice that blue light on the dongle won’t flash and will be solid blue if the connection is uninterrupted. I also suggest moving everything away from the dongle that uses 2.4GHz band. My suggestion is to please get extension USB cable when you are buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Avicenna

customer_reviews.title: Next time a lot more research
customer_reviews.text: Let down, I needed a multiplayer headset and I ended up buying a specialised single player headset, it looks nice with the two mics on each year piece but the ear lads are made with a material that resembles take leather and as such 45-60 minutes your ears start cooking as the sweat runs down your neck, of all the choice I had it sickens me that I went for this pair, you may think the 3 stars is generous but I understand there's lots of gamers who don't play multiplayer games and don't play long sessions if this doesn't explain you as a gamer knock 1-1,1/2 stars from the score.
customer_reviews.author: Cleetis Slackjaw

customer_reviews.title: The best headset I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This headset is absolutely incredible, the best headset I've used, I'm not sure the 3D audio does anything for me, but the surround sound in general, crystal clear, superb quality of the audio is just fantastic, the way the headset works easily with any other device using the cable is also great. It is so light and comfortable and even folds away neatly. So very happy with this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Fat Chris

customer_reviews.title: What I like: - looks - really nice sound quality and ...
customer_reviews.text: What I like: - looks - really nice sound quality and virtual sound actually works Dislike - lasted only 6 months, won't charge anymore - when batteries are low, it makes a loud, defeaning sound - charges via micro usb, which will probably become loose after a year or so
customer_reviews.author: K. Pawlowski

product_meta.title: Sony PlayStation 4 Platinum Wireless Headset
product_meta.description:
The Platinum wireless headset takes gaming audio to a whole new dimension, delivering rich highly-positional virtual surround sound in all PlayStation4 games.Gain a competitive edge, by pinpointing every move your enemy makes and become deeply immersed in multi-layered soundscapes, whether you're engaged in multiplayer combat or engrossed in a single player adventure.

BOX CONTAINS
PS4 Platinum Wireless Headset
feature_bullets: Built-in mics capture your voice and cancel out distracting noise, no matter how you’re wearing your headset
A lightweight, durable design that is comfortable to wear for hours, with an extended-life battery so you can stay in the game longer between recharges
71 virtual surround sound: Experience highly positional virtual surround sound powered by revolutionary 3D audio technology
